name: The Bronze Knight - LD46
description:
You are a Robot Knight that has to protect and fuel the princess while not running out of energy yourself. There will be an on-slot of enemies that will get in your way - you must defeat them and hope you'll find a way to keep your love alive, robot love.

Multiple waves of enemies will attack and you must defend the princess and prepare for the future, as the robot princess is ancient technology which is very inefficient. She uses a battery charge in 3 minuets and and can store power for 4 minuets max. You your self also need power as well, so get batteries from the spawning platforms.

Controls:

Move - a / d / ← / →

Jump - Space

Attack - z / ,

Dash - x / .

Credit:
JustARoom - 1st Programmer
rrmTV - 2nd Programmer
CookieRA - "3rd Programmer" and Artist
Made in Unity Teams (C# language)
Sprites made with Aseprite
Sounds made with sfxr.exe
